subject: Baseball
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Zimmermann, who turned down a five-year, $105 million offer from the Nationals last winter, got an extra $5 million from the Tigers even though his E.R.A. rose by a run.
snippet: Zimmermann, who turned down a five-year, $105 million offer from the Nationals last winter, got an extra $5 million from the Tigers even though his E.R.A. rose by a run.
